name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory Limited Edition
summary: In this latest installment of the popular Hyperdimension Neptunia series, Neptune reprises her role as the self-aware main character and meets characters new and old after getting transported back to the '80s version of Gamindustri. Prepare for a refined and even faster-paced battle system! Fans of the series will be able to immerse themselves even deeper into the mythos of Gamindustri with Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory. Limited Edition Includes: • Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory - Full-color, hardcover art book - 2 exclusive Time Capsule Tins - Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory OST - Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory game for PS3 Platform: PlayStation®3 system Developer: IDEA FACTORY/ COMPILE HEART Publisher: NIS America, Inc. Genre: Strategy RPG Players: Single Release Date: March 21, 2013
